mean_en: showing that you do not approve of or like somebody/something; (of conditions, situations, etc.) not good and likely to cause problems or make something more difficult
sentence: My boss's opinion of my work was unfavorable.
sentence_trans: 老板觉得我的作品不好。
word_etyma: un不 ＋ favor喜爱 ＋ able可...的 → unfavorable不宜的；令人不快的；不顺利的
